message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,200,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, of course.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I'm aiming for a higher price point, I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000.  I believe this still reflects the true value of the product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,050,000.
